events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's message regarding requesting money back.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the order you mentioned.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Attached is the photo showing the size label which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email once it is complete.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear explanation on how the refund will proceed.
The refund has now been successfully initiated on your account. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your original payment method.
We are following up to confirm whether you have received the refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I have received the refund in my account. Thank you for the great customer service and prompt handling.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please contact us again if you have any other questions or concerns in the future.
